about_the_game:
Deluxe Edition includes Soundtrack and Wallpapers from the game.

Wallpapers: 5 beautiful wallpapers of the game in 1920x1080 and 1280x720 resolution.

Soundtrack: Two tracks from the game in MP3:

1. Track01
2. Track02
